revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Newmoon Island |image = [[File:Newmoon Island.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Newmoon Island. |tokens = 96,500 |location = The rightmost island off the northwestern coast of Sinnoh. }} '''Newmoon Island''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Volbeat.png|40px]] Volbeat || rowspan=4 colspan=2 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Plusle.png|40px]] Plusle |- | [[File:Absol.png|40px]] Absol |- | [[File:Luvdisc.png|40px]] Luvdisc |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Darkrai.png|40px]] Darkrai || <center>11,000,000 || colspan=3 | <center> N/A |}
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 2 || 49.99% || 48.11% || 40.43% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 24.99% || 24.05% || 20.21% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Black Shard}} || N/A || 20.01% || 21.04% || 25.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Dread Plate}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.21% || 10.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Black Glasses}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 4.03% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || 2 || 50.00% || 50.00% || 50.00% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 25.00% || 25.00% || 25.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Black Shard}} || N/A || 24.00% || 24.00% || 24.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Dread Plate}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Black Glasses}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |} </tab> </tabs>
